wikipedia_page.main: Sonia Samuels (born 16 May 1979) is a British long-distance runner. She competed in the marathon event at the 2013 World Championships in Athletics in Moscow, Russia. Samuels finished in seventh place at the 2017 Berlin Marathon with a time of 2:29:34.
